title: MovieNews | Podcast: The Insider talks crowdfunding with Kevin De La Isla O'Neill, director of The Hit Producer
text:
On this week's Insider Podcast, we talked to Kevin De La Isla O'Neill, director of Irish thriller The Hit Producer .
Kevin began a crowdfunding campaign on FundIt.ie to gather a budget for the film, raising over â‚¬18,000 through the website alone. At the time, THe Hit Producer was one of the first films to be crowdfunded in Ireland and became something of a success story for the process.
We talked to Kevin about that process, of gathering funds for making the film, how it differs to the traditional route and what problems people can face on the route. He also talked about the production itself, the lengthy post-production process and how the film has fared in festivals and overseas.
